Test Name: HTLV I/II DNA, Qualitative Real-Time PCR
Purpose: To qualitatively detect HTLV I/II DNA in patient samples using real-time PCR for identification of HTLV I/II infection.
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument (e.g., Applied Biosystems 7500), DNA extraction system (e.g., QIAcube), microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, aerosol-resistant pipettes
